page.title: 05THE FARMING YEAR LAMBING
page.content:
My name is Sonia Richards.We live on a mixed farm.{It is lambing time. Dad has to get up at 5.00 am. First he looks round the building where we keep the sheep that will soon lamb.
Some lambs are too big and get stuck in their mothers then Dad has to help.He finds the leg of the lamb and pulls on it until the lambs head is out then the sheep does the rest.
A sheep sometimes has twins and hasn't enough milk forboth of them so we take one of them and they are fed by us from a bottle.We keep them warm by using four bales of straw in a square with a sheet of tin over the top.Dad checks them six times a day.
